scenario:
# Name: Originate SIPL user. # SIPp version: 3.5 # Injection file: database.csv # Command: Please see in bash file # Revision: 1 # Comments: # Add bi-direct BYE. # Add CANCEL message.
######### SEND INVITE TO OTHER USERS #######################
INVITE sip:[field3]@[field4] SIP/2.0 From: <sip:[field1]@[field4]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field3]@[field4]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [field0]:[field2];alias;branch=[branch] Content-Length: [len] Max-Forwards: 70 Contact: <sip:[field1]@[field0]:[field2];transport=[transport]> Accept-Language: en Allow: INVITE,CANCEL,BYE,ACK,SUBSCRIBE,NOTIFY,MESSAGE,INFO,PUBLISH,REFER,UPDATE,PRACK Content-Type: application/sdp User-Agent: Avaya one-X Emulator 2.6.0 (22029) Supported: eventlist, replaces, timer
v=0 o=sip:[field1]@[field0] 1 120 IN IP4 [field0] s=sip:[field1]@[field0] c=IN IP4 [field0] b=CT:1920 b=AS:1920 b=TIAS:1920000 t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 8 0 18 4 110 120 b=TIAS:64000 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000/1 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000/1 a=rtpmap:18 G729/8000/1 a=fmtp:18 annexb=no a=rtpmap:4 G723/8000/1 a=rtpmap:110 G726-32/8000/1 a=rtpmap:120 telephone-event/8000/1
### SEND PRACK ###
PRACK sip:[field3]@[$6]:5060;transport=[transport];asm=1 SIP/2.0 [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: [cseq] PRACK Max-Forwards: 70 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [field0]:[field2];branch=[branch] Supported: histinfo, join, replaces, replaces User-Agent: Avaya one-X Emulator 2.6.0 (22029) Record-Route:[$61] RAck: 1[$55] Content-Length: 0
ACK [$95];transport=tcp;asm=1 SIP/2.0 [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq:[$92] ACK Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [field0]:[field2];alias;branch=[branch] Route:[$61] Content-Length: 0 Max-Forwards: 70 User-Agent: Avaya one-X Emulator 2.6.0 (22029)
### Duration time change the timeout value ####
SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] [last_From:] [last_To:] User-Agent: Avaya one-X Emulator 2.6.0 (22029) Content-Length: 0
BYE [$95];transport=tcp;[$96] SIP/2.0 From:[$93] To:[$94] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [field0]:[field2];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
CANCEL sip:[field3]@[field4];transport=tcp;user=phone SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [field0]:[field2];branch=[branch] [last_From:] To: <sip:[field3]@[field4]> [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: [cseq] CANCEL Max-Forwards: 70 User-Agent: Avaya one-X Emulator 2.6.0 (22029) Supported: eventlist, replaces Content-Length: [len]
ACK sip:[field3]@[field4] SIP/2.0 [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq:[cseq] ACK User-Agent: Avaya one-X Emulator 2.6.0 (22029) Content-Length: [len]
SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] [last_From:] [last_To:] User-Agent: Avaya one-X Emulator 2.6.0 (22029) Content-Length: 0
SIP/2.0 100 Trying Via:[$51] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] [last_From:] [last_To:] Content-Length: [len]
SIP/2.0 200 OK Via:[$51] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] [last_From:] [last_To:] Contact: <sip:[field1]@[field0]:[field2];transport=tcp> Allow: INVITE,ACK,BYE,CANCEL,SUBSCRIBE,NOTIFY,MESSAGE,REFER,INFO,PRACK,PUBLISH,UPDATE Supported: eventlist, feature-ref, replaces, tdialog User-Agent: Avaya one-X Emulator 2.6.0 (22029) Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=sip:[field1]@[field0] 1 120 IN IP4 [field0] s=sip:[field1]@[field0] c=IN IP4 [field0] b=CT:1920 b=AS:1920 b=TIAS:1920000 t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 8 0 18 4 110 120 b=TIAS:64000 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000/1 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000/1 a=rtpmap:18 G729/8000/1 a=fmtp:18 annexb=no a=rtpmap:4 G723/8000/1 a=rtpmap:110 G726-32/8000/1 a=rtpmap:120 telephone-event/8000/1
ACK sip:[field3]@[field4] SIP/2.0 [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq:[cseq] ACK User-Agent: Avaya one-X Emulator 2.6.0 (22029) Content-Length: [len]
